data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bruce, A. J. (2006): Periclimenes manihine sp. nov., a new pontoniine shrimp of the P. alcocki species group (Crustacea: Decapoda: Palaemonidae). Zootaxa 1309: 45-54, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.173830
